title: Find My Parked Car
summary: Never forget your parking location again! Now with Automatic Parking Detection.
description: What is Find My Parked Car?Find My Parked Car allows you to save your exact parking location and view it at a later time when needed. After parking your car, press the park button and your location will be saved. When you later need to see where you parked your car, you can open the app and view it's exact location.Automatic Parking DetectionFind My Parked Car detects when you start walking after driving, and notifies you with your accurate parking location. The app also notifies you when you get near your car, and guides you to its location.Features• Automatic Parking Detection• Take a picture of the parking location• Set an alarm for metered parking• Write a note with the floor number or street name• Android Wear support (both rectangular and round watches)• Turn-by-turn walking navigation• Parking History• Share parking location with others• Android N quick titleBecome a beta testerhttp://bit.ly/find-my-parked-car-beta
descriptionHTML:
What is Find My Parked Car?
Find My Parked Car allows you to save your exact parking location and view it at a later time when needed. After parking your car, press the park button and your location will be saved. When you later need to see where you parked your car, you can open the app and view it's exact location.

Automatic Parking Detection
Find My Parked Car detects when you start walking after driving, and notifies you with your accurate parking location. The app also notifies you when you get near your car, and guides you to its location.

Features
• Automatic Parking Detection
• Take a picture of the parking location
• Set an alarm for metered parking
• Write a note with the floor number or street name
• Android Wear support (both rectangular and round watches)
• Turn-by-turn walking navigation
• Parking History
• Share parking location with others
• Android N quick title

Become a beta tester
http://bit.ly/find-my-parked-car-beta
comments: Only used a couple of days so far but seems accurate.
Just stays on the loading screen.

I bought the Automatic OBD Device last year and kept getting prompted with the advertisement of the Find My Parked Car app.  So I tried it.  It worked for a while using the free version.  So I decided to buy the licensed version.  I did and now it doesn't automatically detect where I'm parked.  I read the advertisement and it said that I had to press a button to save my parking location.  I never had to to that before, and now after pressing the button the app still doesn't save my location.  The advertisement also says that it automatically detects where you park.  This is not true!!  The app shows where my phone is located (on which the app is running).  What is more frustrating is that the app shows a car picture as to indicate where I've parked.  Moreover, the advertisement says that it will prompt you to save the location.  I have yet to see a prompt even when I have it set in the settings to prompt me.  I'm so disappointed that I paid for the app.  I want a refund.
Great app.  One of the few that lets you manually relocate your parking location.
Will embarass you front of company. Just as you need to find your car. Horrible phone disabling adds will comeup freeze your phone Do not install...Horrible. Hated it!!!!
recentChanges: • Reduced latency of getting current location
• Fixed Automatic Parking Detection not starting automatically after restart
• Fixed "Park" app shortcut not saving the parking location
As many of you requested, this update makes the dark theme available for free to all users. A new black theme is also available, as well as an option to change the default blue primary color.
